sentences.en: A new bank - protection technology using tetrahedron - like penetrating frame groups is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍一种新型护岸技术 ― ―四面六边透水框架群护岸.

sentences.en: And so now I have hydrogens at the four corners of a tetrahedron.
sentences.cn: 放在碳正四面体,的四个角上。

sentences.en: Based on the experimental results , the tetrahedron - like penetrating frame was used in actual projects.
sentences.cn: 混凝土四面六边透水框架是一种新型江河透水护岸工程技术.

sentences.en: Each tetrahedron shares two of its oxygens with neighboring tetrahedra.
sentences.cn: 每个四面体都有两个氧原子是与其相邻的两个四面体共用的.

sentences.en: So, this forms a tetrahedron, which forms the sp3 hybrid orbitals.
sentences.cn: 这就形成了一个四面体，它是由sp3杂化轨道形成的。

sentences.en: Tetrahedron sandstone statues tower, the existing four, descending, were folded pyramid.
sentences.cn: 四面体砂岩造像塔, 现存4块, 由大到小,呈塔形叠起.

sentences.en: The center of inscribed circle of tetrahedron is called incenter.
sentences.cn: 四面体内切球的球心称为四面体的内心。

sentences.en: The shape of a water molecule is such that each H2O molecule is surrounded by four neighbours arranged in the shape of a triangular pyramid - better known as a tetrahedron.
sentences.cn: 一个水分子的形状是这样的：相邻地四个水分子组成一个金字塔形的四面体。

sentences.en: We can now use tetrahedron and hexahedron elements in three - dimensional stress analysis.
sentences.cn: 我们现在在三维应力分析中采用四面体单元和六面体单元.

trans.tran_en: a solid figure having four plane faces
